sections.heading: General; actions involving use of waters in interstate streams; special counsel; expense
sections.text: The Attorney General is authorized to employ such assistance and incur such expenses as shall be necessary in any such actions.SourceLaws 1915, c. 223, § 2, p. 492;C.S.1922, §§ 4842, 4843;C.S.1929, § 84-209;R.S.
